      • determineWhoStarts

        public Trainer determineWhoStarts()
        Determines which trainer starts based on chosen pokemon's speed. If speed for both pokemon is tied, order is determined by 'coin toss'.
        Returns:
        trainer1 if trainer 1 goes first, trainer2 if trainer 2 goes first.

                        Pokemon defendPokemon)
        Effects from an attack are applied.
        Parameters:
        attackPokemon - pokemon performing the attack
        defendPokemon - pokemon defending against attack
        attack - the attack to be triggered

      • isBattleOver

        public boolean isBattleOver()
        Battle is over when all battle pokemon HP are zero for either trainer.
        Returns:
        true if one player has no HP left for any of battle pokemon, false otherwise.

      • areAllPokemonDrained

        public boolean areAllPokemonDrained(java.util.List<Pokemon> chosenPokeList)
        Checks if all pokemon in a list are 'incapacitated' (i.e. currHP = 0)
        Parameters:
        chosenPokeList - Pokemon list to iterate through
        Returns:
        true if all pokemon are incapacitated, false otherwise
